about_the_game:
Tuna Rice is a silly little visual novel about warm and fluffy... tuna rice 🐟🍚!



q. Does he put mayo in the tuna rice?
a. No, he hates mayo.


"Mayo-- Are you joking?"

Features

  • 1,000 word (around 10 minutes reading time)
  • Linear visual novel with no choices/branches
  • Original art
  • Warm friendship!

Credits

  • story, art, programming: Konayachi
  • rain sound ambience: freesfx.co.uk
  • proofreading: S.B.Hunter

Translations

  • French: Hugo Lorenzini
  • Português BR: Ony

I had fun making this! Thank you for reading! ^^
This game was made for the O2A2 VN Jam 2023, a micro Visual Novel jam with strict asset limitations and a 1000 word limit.
